HTTPHeadersAccept-Patch.summary: The Accept-Patch response HTTP header advertises which media-type the server is able to understand in a PATCH request.

remarks.para: Accept-Patch in response to any method means that PATCH is allowed on the resource identified by the Request-URI. Two common cases lead to this:

A server receiving a PATCH request with an unsupported media type could reply with {{HTTPStatus("415")}} Unsupported Media Type and an Accept-Patch header referencing one or more supported media types.
